first_interaction.speaker: Toto
first_interaction.text: Hi! Ang daming tao dito sa barangay court, noh? Lagi ako dito kasi ang saya manood!

first_interaction.speaker: Toto
first_interaction.text: Minsan may nag-aaway, minsan may naglalaro. Parang palabas lang sa TV hehe!

repeated_interaction.speaker: Toto
repeated_interaction.text: Uy, ikaw ulit! Tignan mo oh, may nangyayari na naman doon!

repeated_interaction.speaker: Toto
repeated_interaction.text: Gusto mo sabay tayo manood? Baka may bago na namang kwento!
